title: OST Validator | RegTech Data Validation & Submission Tool
text:
OST Validator is a standalone RegTech tool that enables financial institutions to validate, sign, protect and securely submit regulatory reports offline.

Performs checks on your computer locally before submission, helping institutions catch and fix reporting errors early.

Supports XML, XLSX, FSOP formats

Checks data structure & formulas

Applies digital signatures to ensure secure submission and data integrity.

Supports certificates, tokens and plain reports

Protects sensitive reporting data from unauthorized access.

Encrypts files before submission

Supports certificate or token-based encryption

Configurable per regulator policy

Adds layered security for user access and submissions.

Password + token (hardware/software)

Password + OTP/TOTP (SMS, app)

Handles direct transfer of validated data to regulator servers.

Provides flexibility to validate reports offline and submit once an internet connection is available.

Full offline validation capability

B y e l i m i n a t i n g r e p e a t e d u p l o a d s a n d c o r r e c t i o n s , O S T r e d u c e s t i m e , n e t w o r k u s a g e , C P U l o a d , a n d s t a f f e f f o r t b y u p t o 8 0 %

Prepare, validate, and submit data efficiently to regulators.

Secures connections with regulators via SSL certificates.
